homeForDigitalAssets.text: A home for your digital assets.
homeForDigitalAssets.subtext: Safely store and manage your NFTs and tokens with Petra, a self-custodial wallet.

simplifiedTransaction.subtext: Seamlessly buy APT through our partners and send tokens in seconds.

weGotYou.subtext: With user safeguards & simple explanations, we’ll guide you every step of the way.

appLaunch.title: Welcome to Petra
appLaunch.subtext: A Web3 wallet to explore Aptos.

importOptions.title: How Would You Like to Import an Account?

addPrivateKey.title: Enter Private Key
addPrivateKey.subtext: Add an existing wallet with your private key.

createPassword.title: Create a Password
createPassword.subtext: You will use this to unlock your wallet.

faceId.heading: Turn on Face ID
faceId.subtext: Once enabled, you will be able to unlock the app using Face ID.

resetPassword.heading: Are you sure you want to reset the password?
resetPassword.subtext: PLEASE NOTE: You will not be able to recover your wallet account unless you have stored the private key or mnemonic associated with your wallet address.

congratsFinish.subtext: Get ready to enjoy your wallet.
congratsFinish.agreeTerm: By tapping Finish & Accept, you agree

toast.createAccountMnemonic: Unable to create account with recovery phrase.
toast.addAccountMnemonic: Unable to add account with recovery phrase.
toast.createAccountPrivateKey: Unable to create account with private key.
toast.addAccountPrivateKey: Unable to add account with private key.

error.title: Something went wrong.
error.message: The development team has been notified of this error, but we have no way to reach out to discuss it.  Some causes include:
error.solutionOne: Please check your connection and try again.
error.solutionTwo: Please update your app and try again.
error.solutionThree: We restrict certain phone models for safety reasons.  This is very unlikely.

reachOut.text: Please reach out to us on Discord so we can help you troubleshoot your problem.

error.somethingWrongButRecoverable: Something went wrong, but it should work if you kill your app and relaunch.

recoveryPhrase.title: Save Your Secret Recovery Phrase
recoveryPhrase.subtext: This 12-word phrase keeps your account secure and allows you to access your account in the future.
recoveryPhrase.boldText: Be sure to save it in a secure place.
recoveryPhrase.underlineText: See tips on how to save this.

reveal.subtext: Make sure no one can see your screen.

recoveryPhraseInstructionModal.title: How to Save your Secret Recovery Phrase
recoveryPhraseInstructionModal.writeItDown: Write it down on paper. Yep, paper. Keep it in a secure place.
recoveryPhraseInstructionModal.typeDirectly: Type this out directly in a trusted password manager.
recoveryPhraseInstructionModal.takeScreenshot: Take a screenshot and transfer it to a password manager or onto paper. Delete screenshot.
recoveryPhraseInstructionModal.copyPhrase: Copy to clipboard to transfer to a secure place like a password manager.

keepRecoveryPhraseSafeModal.title: Keep Your Secret Recovery Phrase Safe
keepRecoveryPhraseSafeModal.body: If you lose your secret recovery phrase, you’ll have no way of accessing your assets. Not even the Petra team can help you recover it.

enterRecoveryPhrase.title: Show Us You Know It
enterRecoveryPhrase.subtext: Select your phrase in the exact order it was displayed on the previous screen.
enterRecoveryPhrase.boldText: We want to make sure you have this saved!
enterRecoveryPhrase.keepSafeWarning: If you lose it you'll have no way of accessing your assets.

chooseAccountName.title: Choose Account Name
chooseAccountName.subtext: Create a name for the your account to identify it easier. This name is private to you.
chooseAccountName.label: Account Name

biometrics.errorDescription: There was an error authenticating. Please reenable your passcode in settings or try again.
